Name: Sliding Scale Agreement
ServerSideScript:
Class FormScriptEvents
private sub OnCreate()
    dim patName, dob, todaysDate

    patName = theForm.ExecScalerSQL("select First + ' ' + Last from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.Datastore.OwnerObjectGuid.tostring & "'")
    dob = theForm.ExecScalerSQL("select format(DOB, 'MM/dd/yyyy')  from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.Datastore.OwnerObjectGuid.tostring & "'")
    todaysDate = theForm.ExecScalerSQL("select format(dbo.ToLocalTime(GetUTCDate()), 'MM/dd/yyyy')")

    theForm("txtPatientName") = patName
    theForm("txtDateOfBirth") = dob
    theForm("txtTodaysDate") = todaysDate

    theForm("txtaDebug") = theForm("txtaDebug") & VBNewLine & "Patient Name: " & patName & ", DOB: " & dob & ", Today's Date: " & todaysDate
end sub

private sub OnLoad()
    theForm("txtaDebug") = ""
end sub
End Class

FormScripts:
{"ServerScript":"Class FormScriptEvents
private sub OnCreate()
    dim patName, dob, todaysDate

    patName = theForm.ExecScalerSQL("select First + ' ' + Last from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.Datastore.OwnerObjectGuid.tostring & "'")
    dob = theForm.ExecScalerSQL("select format(DOB, 'MM/dd/yyyy')  from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.Datastore.OwnerObjectGuid.tostring & "'")
    todaysDate = theForm.ExecScalerSQL("select format(dbo.ToLocalTime(GetUTCDate()), 'MM/dd/yyyy')")

    theForm("txtPatientName") = patName
    theForm("txtDateOfBirth") = dob
    theForm("txtTodaysDate") = todaysDate

    theForm("txtaDebug") = theForm("txtaDebug") & VBNewLine & "Patient Name: " & patName & ", DOB: " & dob & ", Today's Date: " & todaysDate
end sub

private sub OnLoad()
    theForm("txtaDebug") = ""
end sub
End Class","scriptType":1}

Public Module SlidingScaleAgreement
   Public WithEvents TheForm As Unicentric.Form.FormInstance


End Module
